name: Spin Spin Penguins - Prototype
description:
Description

A prototype used to explore different approaches / engines for HTML5 games. This was made using Construct 2.  Can be played on desktop or browser.

All art and code created is my own.  More professional HTML5 games can be found games in my portfolio.

Instructions

  • using the mouse (desktop) or finger (mobile), swipe to move the penguin in the corresponding direction
  • collect all the stars within the given number of moves
  • no need to wait for the penguins to come to a stop - their movement can be interrupted with another swipe, granting a bit more control
  • ice blocks take three hit to break

Cheat

To unlock all levels, click on the tiny yellow square on the lower right while on the level select screen.
